titles.title: Authorizing the President to proclaim 1993 as "America-the-Beautiful Year".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 6/30/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating the year 1993 as the America-the-Beautiful Year, commemorating the 100th anniversary of the writing of the poem or hymn, "America the Beautiful."
